scripts.content:check: npm run content:check:calc && npm run content:check:resources && npm run build
scripts.audit:local: node scripts/local-duplicate-audit.mjs && node scripts/local-calculator-content-audit.mjs --minWords=500 --top=20 && node scripts/local-resources-audit.mjs --min=400 --top=30 && node scripts/local-guide-content-audit.mjs --minWords=600 --top=20 && npm run build
